title: SMC_TRAFOF_Gantry3 (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_TRAFOF_Gantry3
Forward transformation of three dimensional gantry systems.
Each instance of
SMC_TRAFOF_GANTRY3
can be connected
to a visualization template named
SMC_VISU_Gantry3
Note
For detailed information on transformations
see Overview to
SM_Trafo_POUs
.
